price: Sai suka ci daga gare ta, sabõda haka al'aurunsu suka bayyana, kuma suka shiga sunã lulluɓãwa a kansu daga ganyen Aljanna. Kuma Ãdamu ya sãɓã wa Ubangijinsa, sabõda haka ya ɓace.
arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنۡهَا فَبَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-akalā min'hā fabadat lahumā sawātuhumā waṭafiqā yakhṣifāni ʿalayhimā min waraqi al-janati waʿaṣā ādamu rabbahu faghawā
